titleStmt.title: To all and euery the Queenes Maiesties officers, churchwardens, sidemen, swornemen, and others, hauyng any gouernment or ouersight for the time being, of or in any churche, chappell, or parishe, within the prouince of Caunterburie
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1558-1603 : Elizabeth I)
Elizabeth I, Queen of England, 1533-1603.

publicationStmt.publisher: By R. Iugge and I. Cawood,

notesStmt.note: "Yeuen at Lambeth in the Countie of Surrey the vii. of Iune, in the yere of the raigne of our Soueraigne Lady Elizabeth ... the thirteenth."
Reproduction of original in: Society of Antiquaries.
